info.description: Applies bleed status. Cannot be countered
info.leader: Sharpen blades. All allies get 20% bleed chance on hit; Ignore resistance and stacks with any other status effects the move already does

Steel Counter. Leader has a 50% chance to counter when attacked with taunt active; Taunt increases armor by 50%; A counter attack is for 100% attack power; A counter attack cannot be countered; A counter always hits.

info.header: Attack full row for 75% attack power
info.description: Attacks the row with most gotchis
info.leader: Frenzy. Critical hits multiplier for all allies increases from 150% to 200% attack power.
Cloud of Zen. The leader's Meditate also boosts speed, magic, and physical of all allies by 10%.

info.header: Attack random for 100% attack power and fear for 1 round
info.leader: Spread the fear. All allies get 20% fear chance on hit; Ignore resistance and stacks with any other status effects the move already does.

info.header: Heal all for 20% and Cleanse (remove status effects)
info.leader: Cleansing Aura. Leader automatically cleanses all allies on each of their turns

info.header: Attack all Gotchis for 50% attack power
info.leader: Channel the coven. The leader's Thunder attacks for an extra 25% attack power per alive mage ally.

info.header: Attack Random Gotchi for 130% attack power.
info.leader: Clan momentum. Every troll ally does an auto attack after a successful special.
